name: NULL Hyderabad
tagline: The Hyderabad chapter of India's active open security community, NULL
body:
### Welcome to NULL Hyderabad's Github Page.
This is the github page of NULL Hyderabad, the Hyderabad chapter of India's active open security community, [NULL](http://null.co.in). We haven't started our Github activity yet, but hope to use this in the near future for the benefit of security community.

### What we do?
Eat, sleep and drink security :)

### Our online presence?
You can find us at these coordinates:
* [NULL Hyd chapter website](http://null.co.in/section/chapters/hyderabad-chapter/)
* [NULL Hyd Facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/nullhyd)
* [NULL Hyd Twitter account](https://www.twitter.com/nullhyd)

### Support or Contact
Ping us on FB or tweet to us!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
